definition: to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: O check cloth AnYi thought is class d.
sentences.chinese: 布安姨以爲是華班查對阿丁不滿。

sentences.english: I'll check into it and get back to you.
sentences.chinese: 我查對一下然後送還給你。

sentences.english: Every week the time sheets were scrutinised .
sentences.chinese: 每星期都要仔細查對計工表。

sentences.english: I'll check into it and get back to you。
sentences.chinese: 我查對一下然後送還給你。

sentences.english: I don'tthinkthecostischanged, but I 'll have to check up.
sentences.chinese: 我想費用沒有變動，但我還是要查對一下。

sentences.english: Objective To examine the effect of inquiry-checking in the prevention of errors in medical services.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討詢問式查對在預防醫療差錯中的作用。

sentences.english: B:That's fine.Thank you very much for checking.
sentences.chinese: 好的，非常謝謝你的查對。

sentences.english: Get several written quotations and check exactly what's included in the cost.
sentences.chinese: 要幾份書面報價，仔細查對費用中包含的內容。

sentences.english: There's a lunar calendar for us to check the dates.
sentences.chinese: 我們有一本農曆可供查對。

sentences.english: I"ll check into it and get back to you.
sentences.chinese: 我查對一下然後送還給你。

definition: lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
lit. to cross five passes and slay six generals (idiom)/fig. to surmount all difficulties (on the way to success)
pinyin: guo4 wu3 guan1 zhan3 liu4 jiang4
